mapper.select: SELECT C.CAMPAIGNNAME as CAMPAIGNNAME, CL.CAMPAIGNSUBJECT as CAMPAIGNSUBJECT, C.CAMPAIGNIMG as CAMPAIGNIMG, TO_DATE(to_char(C.DUEDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))-TO_DATE(to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) as DUEDATE FROM CAMPAIGNS_${currentLocale} CL, CAMPAIGNS C WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 AND TO_DATE(to_char(C.DUEDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) >= TO_DATE(to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) AND C.LAUNCHDATE <= SYSDATE AND CL.CAMPAIGNNAME = C.CAMPAIGNNAME ORDER BY C.CAMPAIGNREGDATE DESC

SELECT C.CAMPAIGNNAME as CAMPAIGNNAME, CL.CAMPAIGNSUBJECT as CAMPAIGNSUBJECT, C.CAMPAIGNIMG as CAMPAIGNIMG, TO_DATE(to_char(C.DUEDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))-TO_DATE(to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) as DUEDATE FROM CAMPAIGNS_${currentLocale} CL, CAMPAIGNS C WHERE C.LAUNCHDATE <= SYSDATE AND CL.CAMPAIGNNAME = C.CAMPAIGNNAME ORDER BY C.CAMPAIGNREGDATE DESC

SELECT RL.REWARDSUBJECT as REWARDSUBJECT, R.REWARDIMG as REWARDIMG, R.REWARDAMOUNT as REWARDAMOUNT FROM REWARDS_${currentLocale} RL, REWARDS R WHERE R.REWARDNUM=#{rewardNum} AND R.CAMPAIGNNAME=#{campaignName} AND R.REWARDNUM = RL.REWARDNUM

SELECT C.CAMPAIGNNAME as cName, CL.CAMPAIGNSUBJECT as cSubject, CL.CAMPAIGNSUMMARY as cSummary, CL.CAMPAIGNCONTENTS as cContents, C.GATHERAMOUNT as cAmount, C.FUNDINGUSERCNT as cUseRCount, C.LAUNCHDATE as cLuanchDate, C.DUEDATE as cDueDate, C.YOUTUBECODE as cYoutubeCode, C.YOUTUBEIMG as cYoutubeImg, C.CAMPAIGNIMG as cImg, TO_DATE(to_char(C.DUEDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))-TO_DATE(to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) as cDueToSys FROM CAMPAIGNS_${currentLocale} CL, CAMPAIGNS C WHERE C.CAMPAIGNNAME = #{campaignName} AND CL.CAMPAIGNNAME = C.CAMPAIGNNAME

SELECT R.REWARDNUM as rNum, R.CAMPAIGNNAME as rName, R.REWARDAMOUNT as rAmount, R.REWARDTOTALCNT as rTotalCnt, R.REWARDCURRENTCNT as RLurrnetCnt, RL.REWARDSUBJECT as rSubject, RL.REWARDCONTENTS as RLontents, R.REWARDIMG as rImg FROM REWARDS_${currentLocale} RL, REWARDS R WHERE R.CAMPAIGNNAME = #{campaignName} AND R.REWARDNUM = RL.REWARDNUM
